item.title: A little bad poetry
item.description: As I was going through my archives the other day, I came across a few of my poems that I wrote in college (you know, everyone is a poet when nineteen). I’ve tried my hand at translating a couple into English and found it to be extremely difficult (mostly due to the lack of ability on my part), so I took it as a challenge, and attempted to translate the shortest and least rhymed one.

item.title: Розовое солнышко
item.description: — 1987 — Розовое солнышко На твоих губах Голубая даль в глазах Золото в перстах Ну а я, соколик, Высоко лечу Даль и солнце с золотом Разом отхвачу
